changeSet.author: jbeam
changeSet.sql: /****** Object: Table [dbo].[DataScenario] Script Date: 5/6/2020 5:51:20 PM ******/ CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DataScenario]( [DataScenarioID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [DataScenarioCode] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [DataScenarioName] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [Description] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [ScenarioTypeItemTypeID] [int] NULL, [TimePeriodID] [int] NULL, [ParentID] [int] NULL, [ChildID] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [DataSourcceIDItemTypeID] [int] NULL, [Identifier] [uniqueidentifier] NULL, [CreationDate] [datetime2](7) NULL, [UpdatedDate] [datetime2](7) NULL, [CreatedBy] [int] NULL, [UpdateBy] [int] NULL, [IsActive] [bit] NULL, [IsDeleted] [bit] NULL, [RowVersion] [varbinary](max) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_DataScenario] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [DataScenarioID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY]

changeSet.author: jbeam
changeSet.sql: /****** Object: Table [dbo].[StatisticalData] Script Date: 5/6/2020 5:51:20 PM ******/ CREATE TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData]( [StatisticalDataID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [EntityID] [int] NULL, [DepartmentID] [int] NULL, [StatisticCodeStatisticsCodeID] [int] NULL, [StatisticTimePeriodTimePeriodID] [int] NULL, [FiscalYearIDItemTypeID] [int] NULL, [FiscalYearMonthIDItemTypeID] [int] NULL, [Value] [int] NOT NULL, [ParentID] [int] NULL, [ChildID] [nvarchar](max) NULL, [DataSourcceIDItemTypeID] [int] NULL, [Identifier] [uniqueidentifier] NULL, [CreationDate] [datetime2](7) NULL, [UpdatedDate] [datetime2](7) NULL, [CreatedBy] [int] NULL, [UpdateBy] [int] NULL, [IsActive] [bit] NULL, [IsDeleted] [bit] NULL, [RowVersion] [varbinary](max) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_StatisticalData] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [StatisticalDataID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY]
